Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |xue becomes a buffalo. In this form he eats grass and his wife sees him. [incomplete] 1) p.9348v: see |xue as tchaxa, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-5.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |xue as a buffalo
